OOC: ::Busts souls kneecaps in for Rauq since he hasnt posted yet:: 
Keep it IC, you act like your chivtrons wouldnt have a chance. When 
you control chars in seperate factions and they get into a fight with 
each other you have to play them how you would play them if they were 
fighting a seperate faction. Just because your chars hate each other 
doesnt mean you have to kill the chars of one faction off. Thats just 
plain dumb its like saying "Oh, I like this faction so all these guys 
have to die now because I cant handle them attacking each other." 
Look at Yan, he has the alliance against the Maximals, he doesnt go 
around killing his alliance chars and maximal chars simply because 
they cant or wont coexist. ou should try to do the same.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Soulstice Omega" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> OOC: Okay, I'm sorry, but it's the truth. My characters could not 
co-exist in the same faction like that, ad then what? Make them act 
unrealistic? To keep them in character of course the Mafia would 
attack the Chivtrons, and then  who would I have die? As much as I 
like them, my Chivtrons would end up dying. It's not a threat, 
honest, I'm just pointing out what would really happen. Sorry if you 
took it as a threat...
> 
>   ----- Original Message ----- 
>   From: Yanshosh@a... 
>   To: nbwrpg@y... 
>   Sent: Saturday, June 30, 2001 10:24 PM
>   Subject: Re: Dear owners of the Cybers...
> 
> 
>   If anyone continues to post on the subject of factions and stuff 
OOC, I'll have rAuq kneecap them. Now, for the (hopefully) final 
commant on this:
> 
>   First of all: Soulstice, that was just plain cheap. Its threats 
like those that make people not want people's chars in their 
faction. "If you do this, I'll kill off my chars on your side" is 
exactly what makes faction commanders begin to rely on your chars 
less and less, resulting in them being ignored.
> 
>   Second of all: as Gunthers said, quit trying to predict what the 
Alliance is gonna do. You're all wrong so far anyways.
> 
> 
> 
>   --- In nbwrpg@y..., "Soulstice Omega" <thecode@p...> wrote:
>   > OOC: I did a poll. Want to vote in it? All I'm saying is that 
if there is an alliance, all of my Chivtrons are going to die. I 
didn't really want that, though...
> 
> 
>
